resources.string: Quite often, when communicating on the Internet, people send each other links. Sometimes these links are long. Sometimes very very long. But almost always-too long. In order to get rid of this problem, this app was created. Yes, I know there are thousands of them, but this one is better! And then everything is simple: insert a link in the input field, click \"Click\" and get a short, very short URL.
Give permission to the camera to scan the QR code
